column1:
Welcome To Tablao

Create HTML tables like a spreadsheet
Tablao is a table editor that allows you to create HTML tables like you create tables in Excel.
column2: Preview your table with simple styling. This styling gets not exported.

column1: You don't need to write cumbersome HTML-tags, Markdown- or ASCII tables anymore.
column2: Choose if you create HTML tables with or without header

column1: But unlike Excel, Tablao creates proper HTML tables.
column2: Paste Data from Excel, Libre Office or Numbers.

column1: HTML tables created with Tablao are without any style information
column2: Use HTML code in your table cells

column1: and very easy to use in your own HTML documents.
column2: Autosave - your table is automaticly saved when you close Tablao or the window looses focus

column1: Start now and create your first HTML table with Tablao!
column2: Your previous session gets automaticly reloaded when you start tablao.
